DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomized , multi-center study intend evaluate Zilver® Vena™ stent treatment symptomatic iliofemoral venous outflow obstruction .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic venous outflow obstruction two iliofemoral venous segment ( one limb ) , demonstrate : CEAP ' C ' ≥ 3 , VCSS pain score ≥ 2 < 18 year age Pregnant planning become pregnant next 12 month Planned surgical interventional procedure ( except thrombolysis thrombectomy preparation procedure vena cava filter placement prior stent implantation patient high risk pulmonary embolism ) within 30 day prior study procedure . Lesions intend treatment length extend inferior vena cava level lesser trochanter Previous stenting target vessel Iliofemoral venous segment unsuitable treatment available size study device
